DataHive: Distributed Data Collection for e-Commerce and AI Companies

DataHive is a distributed platform designed to meet the data collection needs of e-Commerce and AI companies. By installing the DataHive Chrome extension, users can contribute to distributed data collection effortlessly.

The extension runs in the background, using minimal system resources by adjusting the data collection rate based on CPU and memory usage. It respects your privacy, as it doesn't access personal information or track your browsing activity.

To log you in, the extension uses the Web3Auth module. You can log in with a passwordless option or through your Google account.

As a user, you are rewarded for each data collection task completed.
